titles.title: Workforce Fairness and Tax Relief Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax relief to the unemployed, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/9/2008--Introduced. Workforce Fairness and Tax Relief Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) repeal the inclusion of unemployment compensation in gross income; (2) allow tax-free distributions from retirement plans for unemployed individuals; (3) allow an exclusion from gross income for employee severance payments; and (4) increase the tax credit for the health insurance costs of individuals receiving trade adjustment assistance and certain pension payments.
